name: Arkanoid Alba Elias y Sergi Lozano
name_original: Arkanoid Alba Elias y Sergi Lozano
description:
Arkanoid Alba Elias y Sergi Lozano is a game developed by ae_robas. It came out on 18-12-2019.
Arkanoid Alba Elias y Sergi Lozano is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. The game is sold via itch.io.
